column1: '''Nicole Evangeline Lilly''' ([[3 August]], [[1979]]) is a Canadian actress, best known as Kate Austen in ''[[Wikipedia:Lost (TV series)
column2: Lost]]'', which also starred [[Dominic Monaghan]]. She played [[Tauriel]] in the [[The Hobbit (film series)
